name: Man Out of Time
text: Give to the Steve Rogers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Steve Rogers â†’ remove Man Out of Time from the game. - Discard half of the cards in your hand, rounded down. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "To avenge my father, Captain America must die."
name: Baron Zemo
text: Quickstrike. While Baron Zemo is engaged with you, you cannot thwart. (Captain America's nemesis minion.)
